014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect;
015
016import java.beans.ConstructorProperties;
017import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
018import java.lang.reflect.Method;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021import java.util.stream.Stream;
022
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.UtilityClassException;
024
025/**
026 * Utilities for {@link JdbiConstructor} annotation.
027 */
028public class JdbiConstructors {
029    private JdbiConstructors() {
030        throw new UtilityClassException();
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * Find an invokable instance factory, such as a constructor or a static factory method.
035     * Prefer an {@link JdbiConstructor} annotated constructor or static factory method if
036     * one is present. Throws if multiple or zero candidates are found.
037     *
038     * @param <T>  the type to inspect
039     * @param type the type to inspect
040     * @return the preferred constructor or static factory method
041     */
042    static <T> InstanceFactory<T> findFactoryFor(Class<T> type) {
043        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
044        final Constructor<T>[] constructors = (Constructor<T>[]) type.getDeclaredConstructors();
045
046        List<Constructor<T>> explicitConstructors = Stream.of(constructors)
047            .filter(constructor -> constructor.isAnnotationPresent(JdbiConstructor.class))
048            .filter(constructor -> !constructor.isSynthetic())
049            .collect(Collectors.toList());
050
051        List<Method> explicitFactoryMethods = Stream.of(type.getDeclaredMethods())
052            .filter(method -> method.isAnnotationPresent(JdbiConstructor.class))
053            .collect(Collectors.toList());
054
055        if (explicitConstructors.size() + explicitFactoryMethods.size() > 1) {
056            throw new IllegalArgumentException(type + " may have at most one constructor or static factory method annotated @JdbiConstructor");
057        }
058        if (explicitConstructors.size() == 1) {
059            return new ConstructorInstanceFactory<>(explicitConstructors.get(0));
060        }
061        if (explicitFactoryMethods.size() == 1) {
062            return new StaticMethodInstanceFactory<>(type, explicitFactoryMethods.get(0));
063        }
064
065        return new ConstructorInstanceFactory<>(findImplicitConstructorFor(type));
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Find an invokable constructor.  Prefer an {@link JdbiConstructor} annotated
070     * one if present.  Throws if multiple or zero candidates are found.
071     *
072     * @param <T>  the type to inspect
073     * @param type the type to inspect
074     * @return the preferred constructor
075     */
076    public static <T> Constructor<T> findConstructorFor(Class<T> type) {
077        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
078        final Constructor<T>[] constructors = (Constructor<T>[]) type.getDeclaredConstructors();
079
080        List<Constructor<T>> annotatedConstructors = Stream.of(constructors)
081                .filter(c -> c.isAnnotationPresent(JdbiConstructor.class))
082                .collect(Collectors.toList());
083
084        if (annotatedConstructors.size() > 1) {
085            throw new IllegalArgumentException(type + " may have at most one constructor annotated @JdbiConstructor");
086        } else if (annotatedConstructors.size() == 1) {
087            return annotatedConstructors.get(0);
088        }
089
090        return findImplicitConstructorFor(type);
091    }
092
093    private static <T> Constructor<T> findImplicitConstructorFor(Class<T> type) {
094        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
095        final Constructor<T>[] constructors = (Constructor<T>[]) type.getDeclaredConstructors();
096
097        List<Constructor<T>> annotatedConstructors = Stream.of(constructors)
098                .filter(c -> c.isAnnotationPresent(ConstructorProperties.class))
099                .collect(Collectors.toList());
100
101        if (annotatedConstructors.size() > 1) {
102            throw new IllegalArgumentException(type + " may have at most one constructor annotated @ConstructorProperties");
103        } else if (annotatedConstructors.size() == 1) {
104            return annotatedConstructors.get(0);
105        }
106
107        if (constructors.length != 1) {
108            throw new IllegalArgumentException(type + " must have exactly one constructor, or specify it with @JdbiConstructor or @ConstructorProperties");
109        }
110        return constructors[0];
111    }
112}
